!Trader Vladimir: Ah, we have a customer. Yes, please come this way! I cannot let a person of obvious class like you trade with that swindler Drumond! You must be on guard against dishonest merchants during times like these. The equipment you find here in my shop are the genuine article, however. You can believe me!
